title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 432.7 - Access to reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 432.7 - Access to reports

State Regulations

The commissioner of social services in each social
services district shall insure that any reports made, as well as any other
information obtained, reports written or photographs taken concerning such
reports, be confidential and shall only be made available to those persons
defined under title 6 of article 6 of the Social Services Law, because any
person who willfully permits and any person who encourages the release of any
data and information contained in the local or statewide register to persons or
agencies not permitted by title 6 of article 6 of the Social Services Law shall
be guilty of a class A misdemeanor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

432.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
